title: Runic Markup Language
description: A markup language used for writing general purpose documents, with accompanying tool-suite including a parser, transpiler, web IDE and command-line tool.

title: PDFb
description: A library providing a number of methods for programatically creating extensible and customisable PDF documents in Go.

title: PicGo
description: An multiplayer pictionary game written in Go, with avatar builder, usernames, live chat, and a super smooth drawing experience.

title: SVG Music Visualiser
description: An SVG scene of a mountain range at sunset that moves with the frequencies of the selected audio track controlled by JavaScript.

title: Go Dojo
description: A guide to programming in Go, suitable for beginners, adept programmers, and anyone interested in the Go language.

title: Anirak IDE Theme
description: A dark theme for VS Code and popular terminal emulators with a modern and minimalist blue-green appearance.

title: VPS Guide
description: A document designed to guide the reader through the process of setting up a secure Virtual Private Server.

title: Lava Lamp Landing Page
description: A full-screen lava lamp effect created with React.js and Tailwind CSS.

title: HTML Desktop Concept
description: An interactive desktop built with HTML bringing to life the idea for a modern desktop environment.
